Introducing the ultimate deadline tracker extension for your browser! With our app, you can effortlessly calculate the number of days between any two dates or the number of days until your next deadline. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply someone who wants to stay organized, our extension is the perfect solution.

With just a few clicks, you can choose whether to skip weekends or holidays or skip to the next business day, making it easy to calculate accurate deadlines. No more manual calculations or guesswork - our app does all the hard work for you, saving you valuable time and reducing stress.

Our extension is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, so you can start using it right away. Simply install the extension in your browser and you're ready to go. You'll love how easy it is to use, and how much time it saves you.

Don't let deadlines sneak up on you anymore. Get our deadline tracker extension today and stay on top of all your important tasks!
